products.name: Ethiopia Duromina
products.description: This bombshell of a cup delivers sweet and citrus notes in an incredible, velvety texture.

products.name: Golden Hour Blend
products.description: A new warming and bright blend. Easy drinking any time of day, but especially charismatic when you can stop and sit with it.

products.name: Mazama X Stumptown Mug
products.description: A Stumptown staff favorite. We worked together with Mazama to create a glaze that reminds us of the unparalleled glory that is hot coffee on a foggy morning.

products.name: French Press (12 Cup)
products.description: If you’re boldly going for it, this is your new best friend. You get the most of everything here–big flavor, body, and mouthfeel.
